text: Jean-Pierre Bemba (born 4 November 1962) is a Congolese politician and member of parliament. He served as Vice President of Democratic Republic of Congo from 2003 - 2006 and is running for the president to succeeded by Joseph Kabila in the December 2018 elections.| Jean-Pierre Bemba named as DRC presidential candidate| Bemba to return to DRC Aug 1 ahead of polls | News24| Congo's Jean-Pierre Bemba Nominated as Presidential Candidate Bloomberg == References == Category:1962 births Category:Living people Category:Vice presidents Category:Democratic Republic of the Congo politicians
title: Jean-Pierre Bemba
